# Marco Paga - Senior Solution Architect

> Cloud-Native Architecture, DevOps, and Green IT specialist with 25+ years of software development experience

## About Marco

Marco Paga is a Senior Solution Architect at codecentric AG, specializing in cloud-native architectures, DevOps transformations, Kubernetes, and sustainable IT practices. He is a certified Kubernetes for Developers trainer and has received multiple awards for his community contributions.

**Key Expertise:**
- Cloud-Native Architecture & Kubernetes
- Platform Engineering & Green IT
- DevOps & CI/CD (Tekton, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI)
- Multi-Cloud Environments (AWS, Azure, GCP)
- GitOps (Flux CD, ArgoCD)
- Sustainable Software Development

**Awards & Recognition:**
- codecentric Community Award 2025 - Best Podcast or Vlog
- codecentric Community Award 2024 - Best Podcast or Vlog
